conference a confrontation he's joining

us now what did you see Brian well wolf
I just behind my left shoulder here we

station in City Hall a smattering of

you just showed that was a pretty

harrowing scene there with this a white
supremacist of leader Jason Kessler

having to be shuttled out by riot police
after the crowd kind of converged on him

a short time ago I talked to a police
officer here in Charlottesville about

whether Jason Kessler is still being
held here at the police station for his

own safety that officer said no he is
quote long gone they got him out of here

I asked him where they took him he said
he couldn't tell me that I asked him

whether Kessler is under any police
protection he said oh no we're not
